entry.title: Plant Flags
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 9.95

Plant Flags for your potted plants!

Our plant flags come in a set for three. Each flag is individually detailed, etched in brass and complete with wire posts and blank labels. Stand them in your plant pots and use them as reminders for care tips, plant identification, and more.

Dimensions: 125 x 175mm
Contents: Three plant flags complete with frame, wire, and labels
Material: Brass, Paper coated metal wire, Paper, biodegradable packaging.

entry.title: Herb Care Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 12.95

The ultimate guide to growing and getting the most out of your Herbs! Herb Care Cards are a boxed gift set containing 35 cards packed full of easy-to-follow advice and top tips for becoming a successful botanist.

Learn the basics:
-Propagation: How and when to grow.
-Eat & Drink: The many exciting ways you can use your herbs.
-Pruning: How to prune efficiently and encourage new growth.
-Harvest & Preserving: Getting the most out of your yield.

Unhappy Plant?
These care cards will help identify problems for specific plants and suggest ways to treat the issue.

Herbs featured include; Alpine Strawberry, Basil, Borage, Chamomile, Chervil, Chives, Coriander, Dill, Lavender, Fennel, Tarragon, Geranium, Hyssop, Lady’s Mantle, Lemon Balm, Lemongrass, Lemon Verbena, Lovage, Marigold, Mint, Nasturtium, Oregano, Parsley, Rosemary, Sage, Salad Burnet, Sorrel, Savory, Thyme, Vietnamese Coriander.

Dimensions: 130h x 98 x 27mm
Weight: 220 grams
Contents: Boxed gift set featuring, 32 popular herb care guides+ 5 cards featuring essential basic advice.
Material: Paperboard

entry.title: Houseplant Care Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Another Studio Design Shop
Type: Plant Themed
Price: 12.95

The ultimate guide to growing happy plants! Houseplant Care Cards are a boxed gift set containing 35 cards packed full of advice and tips for botanical success indoors.

Learn the basics:
- Water: How and when to water your plants.
- Light: Where to locate your plants.
- Root Rot: What is it and how to prevent it.
- Humidity: Creating the perfect environment.
- Repotting: Top tips to master.

Unhappy Plant?
These care cards will help identify problems for specific plants and suggest ways to treat the issue.

Dimensions: 130h x 98 x 27mm
Weight: 220 grams
Contents: Boxed gift set featuring, 32 popular houseplants care guides+ 3 cards featuring essential basic advice.
Material: Paperboard
